newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU opens probe into Boeing/McDonnell deal.
newsitem.headline: EU opens probe into Boeing/McDonnell deal.

text.p: The European Commission said on Wednesday it was starting a full probe into the proposed alliance between Boeing Co and Mcdonnell-Douglas Corp.

"The Commission will, in particular, have to examine to what extent Boeing's leading position in the market for commercial jet aircraft could be strengthened by the proposed merger," the Commission said in a statement.
The Commission said that among the issues it would be studying was the new company's access to defence and space technology and possible increased bargaining power with equipment suppliers.

"The Commission will...need to investigate to what extent the large increase in Boeing's defence and space business could strengthen its market position in commercial aircraft, for example in terms of overall financial resources, greater access to technology developed in the defence and space sector, and increased bargaining power vis-a-vis equipment suppliers," it said.
